subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Arsenal had only one shot on target as Chelsea, nearing a Premier League title, earned a 0-0 draw. In Italy, Torino fans attacked a Juventus bus, and Juventus fans threw fireworks at Torino fans.
snippet: Arsenal had only one shot on target as Chelsea, nearing a Premier League title, earned a 0-0 draw. In Italy, Torino fans attacked a Juventus bus, and Juventus fans threw fireworks at Torino fans.
